page.title: 07Ancient Monuments
page.content: The area in this study contains many ancient monuments.The three principal monuments are Maeshowe,Ring o'Brogar and the Stones of Stenness.These monuments are 5000 years old and attract tourists from all over the world. Both the Ring o'Brogar and the Stones of Stenness are henge monuments like Stonehenge itself.Maeshowe is a very fine example of a chambered tomb in an excellent state of repair.Its interest is heightened by Europe's best collection of runic writing left by Vikings in the 12th century.The first archaeological dig in the tomb was made in 1860 and the tomb was opened to the public in 1927.In 1984 17000 people visited this monument and there are two full-time custodians.
